languages.text: "Благодарю. Всегда приятно провести время с понимающим человеком".
"Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю. Всегда приятно провести время с понимающим человеком".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."
"Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."
"Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."
"Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."
"Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."

languages.text: "Danke. Ich freue mich immer, Zeit mit jemandem zu verbringen, der mich versteht."
languages.original_text: "Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."

traits.locale_text: "Danke. Ich freue mich immer, Zeit mit jemandem zu verbringen, der mich versteht."

languages.text: « Merci. C'est toujours un plaisir de passer du temps avec quelqu'un qui comprend. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."

traits.locale_text: « Merci. C'est toujours un plaisir de passer du temps avec quelqu'un qui comprend. »

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます。理解してくれる人と共に過ごすのは、いつだって嬉しいものです」
languages.original_text: "Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます。理解してくれる人と共に過ごすのは、いつだって嬉しいものです」

languages.text: «Gracias. Siempre es un placer pasar tiempo con alguien que lo entiende».
languages.original_text: "Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias. Siempre es un placer pasar tiempo con alguien que lo entiende».

languages.text: “谢谢你，能与理解你的人在一起，始终都是件令人开心的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，能与理解你的人在一起，始终都是件令人开心的事情。”

languages.text: "Teşekkürler. Beni anlayan biriyle zaman geçirmek benim için bir zevk."
languages.original_text: "Thank you. It's always a pleasure to spend time with someone who understands."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkürler. Beni anlayan biriyle zaman geçirmek benim için bir zevk."
